mdRecord.dcterms:isPartOf: Francis H. Pierpont Civil War Telegrams
mdRecord.dcterms:title: Crane, Samuel to Pierpont, Francis H.
mdRecord.dcterms:creator: Crane, Samuel
mdRecord.dcterms:description: FH Peirpoint [Francis H. Pierpont] Wheeling Oct 21 1861. By Telegraph from Grafton 21 1861. Ten or twelve of the best of the citizens of Tucker County are here I have conversed with them Tucker County is quiet send no more troops there one company there now Sam'l Crane 32W101col
mdRecord.dcterms:subject: Crane, Samuel
Grafton, (West) Virginia
Wheeling, (West) Virginia
Pierpont, Francis H.
